title: State agencies; bring forward personal services funding allocations in FY26 budget for certain.
subject: Appropriations A

extras.summary: AN ACT TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 34, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 45, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE PUBLIC UTILITIES STAFF; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 4 OF CHAPTER 67, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 63, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE MISSISSIPPI LIBRARY COMMISSION; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 93, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 17 OF CHAPTER 93, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE BROADBAND EXPANSION AND ACCESSIBILITY OF MISSISSIPPI; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 92, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE MISSISSIPPI DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY; AND TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 86, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE MISSISSIPPI EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT AGENCY, FOR THE PURPOSE OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 3 OF CHAPTER 83, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY; AND TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 5 OF CHAPTER 69, LAWS OF FIRST EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 2025, WHICH PRESCRIBES THE PERSONAL SERVICES FUNDING ALLOCATION FOR THE DIVISION OF MEDICAID, FOR THE PURPOSE OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
